title: Philippines marks Marcos overthrow as son homes in on presidency
description: Thousands of Filipinos gathered on Friday to mark the anniversary of a "People Power" uprising against late dictator Ferdinand Marcos - with a new Marcos era potentially just 10 weeks away.
content: MANILA, Feb 25 (Reuters) - Thousands of Filipinos gathered on Friday to mark the anniversary of a "People Power" uprising against late dictator Ferdinand Marcos - with a new Marcos era potentially juâ€¦ [+2896 chars]
